about_the_game:
The Season Pass includes three DLC packs with a different motif of outfits, furniture, and mini-stories.

Season Pass Content
- DLC 1: Winter Tales
- DLC 2: The Life of Insects
- DLC 3: Together with Animals
- Season Pass bonus: Premium Crops Seed Set

Note: Details concerning the content of DLC 1-3 will be announced at a later date.
The content of each DLC pack on release is subject to change.
Each DLC pack will also be available for purchase separately upon release. Take care to avoid duplicate purchases.
An internet connection is required to play this content.
Portions of the content may be subject to change without prior notice.
*Outfits can be obtained after completing the tutorial on Spring Day 4 of the Bulletin Board and the To-Do List for this bonus. After getting an Outfit Pic, head to the basement of your home and use the Instant Wardrobe Cam to swap outfits.
*Furniture can be obtained/crafted at Belle & Oli's Workshop after expanding your house.
detailed_description:
The Season Pass includes three DLC packs with a different motif of outfits, furniture, and mini-stories.

Season Pass Content
- DLC 1: Winter Tales
- DLC 2: The Life of Insects
- DLC 3: Together with Animals
- Season Pass bonus: Premium Crops Seed Set

Note: Details concerning the content of DLC 1-3 will be announced at a later date.
The content of each DLC pack on release is subject to change.
Each DLC pack will also be available for purchase separately upon release. Take care to avoid duplicate purchases.
An internet connection is required to play this content.
Portions of the content may be subject to change without prior notice.
*Outfits can be obtained after completing the tutorial on Spring Day 4 of the Bulletin Board and the To-Do List for this bonus. After getting an Outfit Pic, head to the basement of your home and use the Instant Wardrobe Cam to swap outfits.
*Furniture can be obtained/crafted at Belle & Oli's Workshop after expanding your house.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti or Radeon R7 265
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600K or AMD Ryzen 7 1700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 Ti or Radeon RX Vega 64
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 35 GB available space

short_description: Season Pass of DORAEMON STORY OF SEASONS: Friends of the Great Kingdom includes DLC Pack 1 ~ 3 and a Season Pass exclusive bonus item.
supported_languages:
English, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Indonesian
*languages with full audio support
